name: FULLWAVE
body:
# Recent publications

There is a growing bibliography around FWI.  Recent Imperial publications on this topic:

* [Anisotropic 3D full-waveform inversion, Geophysics, 2013](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/geo2012-0338.pdf?raw=true)
* [Next-Generation Seismic Experiments: Wide-Angle, Multi-Azimuth, 3D, Full-Waveform Inversion, Geophysical Journal International, 2013](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/GJI-2013.pdf?raw=true)
* [Full-waveform inversion of cycle-skipped seismic data by frequency down-shifting, SEG, 2013](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/down_shift.pdf?raw=true)
* [Which physics for full-wavefield seismic inversion?, EAGE, 2012](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/EAGE_physics.pdf?raw=true)
* [Full-waveform seismic inversion at reservoir depths, EAGE, 2012](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/EAGE-Tommeliten.pdf?raw=true)
* [Quality assured full-waveform inversion: Ensuring starting model adequacy, SEG, 2012](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/phase.pdf?raw=true)
* [Elastic 3D full-waveform inversion, SEG, 2012](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/elastic2.pdf?raw=true)

[**Return to Home Page**](http://fullwave3d.github.io/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
